author: Altary Sherman
text: 'Great prices and friendly staff'

author: Arleth Lozano
text: 'Addicted to their buffalo hot wings! ü§§üòãüëçüçªüçó'

author: Kani Mackenzie
text: 'Awesome bar. Beers are good
column5: location is cool. The space is large
column7: and fun. We came for a quick drink after brunch and this place did not disappoint. The beer was so good we stayed for almost 2 hours.'

author: Jared Erickson
text: 'Location is perfect right on the platform so you wont miss your train'

author: Dominick Ogrodowicz
text: "Inside Hoboken station.  Nothing fancy but a good spot to wait for your train.  Happy hour specials are usually pretty good.  Only complaint is sometimes they play the music so loud that you can't hear yourself think"

author: Jim Pezzillo
text: "Nothing worse to me than a place stating to be open for business at 12pm on Saturday and you are standing outside its doors at 1pm and it still isn't open. Must be run by millenials."

author: Bill Segulin
text: 'My new favorite place.  Carlos and Margo are spot on hosts. This is a great place for a quick drink or bite to eat... very tasty food not the blah bar grub you get elsewhere.  Social and friendly like a local pub conveniently located in Hoboken train station. Even first timers will feel like locals.'

author: Sean Allison
text: 'Margo and Maya perfect  Ts'

author: Kitty Slaughter
text: "I might be biased
column6: best and sweetest bar tenders you will ever meet.  I'm here often
column7: and I will always come back.  Waiting in Hoboken for your train?  Come here!  Get a drink!  Have some popcorn and let Carlos or Margo help you.  Carlos is fab!  They really get into the holidays as well!  We went for Halloween and LOVED the Vegas theme.  I'm originally from Vegas so it was a whole lot of fun for me.  Great bar!"

author: David Macheska
text: 'Reliable dive bar situated at the Hoboken train terminal. Friendly staff and a surprisingly robust variety of bottled beers.'

author: Kevin McCaffrey
text: 'Great service

author: Abhijeet N
text: '5* for quick bite+sip'

author: Clarine Pitts
text: 'the truffle fries were amazing. i loved my kale ceaser salad. the Hoboken was full of ice and it was filled halfway. also i wish they had more Hoboken options and they would let us sit in the booth. Overall very cute place. I love the decoration and vibe.'

author: Stuart Nahas
text: 'Margo is an exceptional bartender'

author: Sydney Slavik
text: 'Solidly mediocre'

author: Michele Sabia
text: 'I have only had drinks there
column5: staff is nice and I hear the food is good.'

author: Shinnok DLS
text: 'Quick pitstop before the home commute'

author: Brownie Vegas
text: 'Quick pit stop before commute home'

author: Rich Q
text: "Sufficiently available. I'm gonna leave it at this."

author: Gary Hughes
text: 'Great staff! Margo and Carlos keep the bar hopping and are very attractive and attentive! ;)  Be back soon!'

author: Sean Wilson
text: '‚Äú Closing ‚Äú and almost closed are two different things - why keep posted hours if your bit going to honor them ??  And the bartender was just plain rude about it - last time I checked the bar business is customer driven
column5: luckily there‚Äôs plenty of other establishments right up the block - I‚Äôd take your money else where but be carful not to miss your train lol'

author: David Ramirez
text: "The bar is good but the burger wasn't good"

author: Ceyna Freitas
text:
'(Translated by Google) Very comfortable. Excellent drinks and well frequented. Top service

(Original)
Muito aconchegante. Bebidas excelentes e bem frequentado. Atendimento top'

author: Stanislav Los
text: 'I have to admit
column5: Sandy snowstorm made a huge favor to this railroad station bar. Lots of draft beer
column6: comfort food. Nice bartenders. It‚Äôs all one need when one missed his train.'

author: Michael Piracci
text: "Best place to wait for a train. Great staff
column5: good prices and nice atmosphere. I've missed more than one train sitting at the bar here."

author: Julia Solomon
text: "Nice bar while waiting for the train. Staff is great
column5: food is great and prices are just right. I laughed when my wings were handed over to the bartender by a man wearing a Sbarro shirt. I think there's one next door and they have  contract with them or something lol"

author: BroadwayCJ97
text: 'The bartender (older woman who "has been there for 26 years") is a complete jerk! Scolds me when I order water instead of a beer and ask her to put the Yankees game on at 10:30 PM. Your job is to SERVE in the SERVICE industry
column5: not tell me what you think I should do. I still tipped even with the horrible service but if you have a chance to get a drink before your train

author: Jason Conn
text: 'No more beer to go?  No one should have to endure a late trip on NJ Transit without a beer.'

author: Adrian Dangerous
text: 'Weekday after work Stop off while waiting for my train. The Stella is always fresh and cold. Staff is great.'

author: Bill Eggers
text: 'The staff here is phenomenal. I always feel like I am part of a family

author: A. Radelat
text: 'Good spot to have drink before getting on train'

author: CB SPQR
text: 'Best place to stop by and have a drink between your commutes'

author: C is for Chad
text: 'A nice bar with food
column5: but steer clear on Thursdays or be subjected to the live music.'
